occupation: retired from freelance systems admin work
description:
Let us share ideas on a wide variety of topics, our experiences and goals in life, our stand on certain issues, our interests, our fears, our everyday joys, with the aim of mutual and self discovery. We will discuss any topic our meandering imaginations will pick along the road. Our opinions will certainly vary but we will maintain mutual tolerance and respect. Let us embark on an indeterminate journey of friendship that begins with writing. 

I am male, butch gay, looking for another, preferably NOT straight, below the age of 60. Emails preferred, chats will be brief. We can communicate here or through my email address. Your choice.
